Pre-Game Insights: Thunder have been impressive this season and enter this game with an 8-1 record
The Warriors have averaged 120.7 points per game and the Thunder have scored 115.7 points per game so far
Chet Holmgren should have more opportunities to score in this game since the Warriors are not that good defensively under the basket and often play small ball
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Monday, 00:00 AM BST
The last eight meetings between the Thunder and the Warriors have all gone over 227.5 total points
Oklahoma City remain without a few injured players, including Isaiah Hartenstein, Jaylin Williams, Nikola Topic, and Kenrich Williams
The Warriors have a clean bill of health heading into this game
Others: The Thunder starting lineup: Gilgeous-Alexander, Wallace, Dort, Williams, Holmgren
The Warriors starting lineup: Curry, Moody, Wiggins, Green, Jackson-Davis
